name: True Colors (itch) (Palmerita Games, Jesús ~ JPezGames, Fran ~ Takox)
name_original: True Colors (itch) (Palmerita Games, Jesús ~ JPezGames, Fran ~ Takox)
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 Entry

Please understand this is still a WIP, there may be bugs in this version and it lacks of some of the features. The game will be updated with a new version in the following days.

Narrative card textless game about showing your own feelings and the communication problems that minorities can face sometimes. The game encompasses the personal growth and how people influence each other, positively or negatively.

Controls
  • Drag and drop cards in the center of the screen
  • Match color or symbol of the other person card to follow the conversation.
Team
  • Game Designer: Fran Gambero
  • Art: Jesús Porras
  • Programmer: Ignacio Aparicio
  • Sound Producer: CloudHerder
